// API base URL (adjust as needed)
const API_BASE='http://localhost:8000';export async function getTables(){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/tables"));if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to fetch tables');return res.json();}export async function getTable(id){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/tables/").concat(id));if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to fetch table');return res.json();}export async function createTable(data){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/tables"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to create table');return res.json();}export async function updateTable(id,data){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/tables/").concat(id),{method:'PUT',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to update table');return res.json();}export async function deleteTable(id){const res=await fetch("".concat(API_BASE,"/tables/").concat(id),{method:'DELETE'});if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to delete table');return res.json();}
